snippet.title: The Urgent Need to Purify Our Energetic Fields
snippet.description:
It doesn't take much to purify ones body of consciousness! Learn how in the Four Elements Transformation: https://www.spiritmysteries.com/four-elements

The world is a complex and interconnected web of energy that is constantly in flux. At the heart of this energy lies our collective consciousness, an energetic field that contains within it the thoughts and actions of every person on the planet. Unfortunately, our collective consciousness is polluted with negative thoughts, emotions, and behaviors, leading to a cycle of toxicity that can be difficult to break free from.

As we navigate the complexities of modern life, it's easy to fall victim to the negative energy that surrounds us. We may find ourselves dwelling on our own problems, feeling angry or frustrated at the world, or struggling with feelings of anxiety or depression. In these moments, it's important to remember that we are not alone - our thoughts and emotions are part of a larger, interconnected web of energy that is constantly influencing the state and quality of our reality.

The good news is that we can take steps to protect ourselves from the negative energy that is so prevalent in our world. By cultivating positive thoughts, emotions, and behaviors, we can help to purify the collective consciousness and create a healthier, more positive world for ourselves and those around us. Whether through mindfulness practices, self-reflection, or acts of kindness and generosity, we each have the power to make a difference in the world and help to heal the collective consciousness. 

The Four Elements transformation has been designed to assist in doing just that. Click Here to learn more and sign up, and you will be amazed by the results: https://www.spiritmysteries.com/four-elements

snippet.title: The Principles of Healing Disease
snippet.description:
Our latest book, Tao Te Ching: The Virtual Way is now available. Use this link to learn more and grab a copy: https://www.spiritmysteries.com/tao-te-ching

The subject of ‚Äòhealing‚Äô is a huge conversation, with a very deep and wide range of modalities. From east to west, the kind of medicine which is considered ‚Äòtraditional‚Äô varies greatly. In finding which works best, one must take into account how their illness came about in the first place, from every dimension of observation.

What emotions have we left unprocessed? What food and drink are we consuming; what is their nutritional content? Are we connected to the energetic blueprint of Spirit? All these factors play a part in our overall wellbeing, or the lack thereof.

In this episode of Spirit Science, we take a look at what makes (or breaks) one‚Äôs health, from the perspective of our multidimensional selves. We cannot fixate on only one ‚Äòmethod‚Äô to inspire healing, we must realize that health needs to be tackled from the perspectives of both body, mind, and spirit. 

The truth is, every form of medicine has its proper place. The more aware we are of the root causes of our illnesses and diseases, the easier time we will have in addressing them at their core, and guaranteeing success in our healing.

This episode was based on the book ‚ÄúScientific Healing Affirmations‚Äù, by Yogic Master Paramahansa Yogananda, and we highly encourage you checking it out if you want to go deeper into this subject.

snippet.description:
So this is a story some may find interesting. It's true to my experience, but of course there is a big question‚Ä¶ was this all just some story created by the medicine, or is it actually true in the astral realm? 

I mean come on, I didn‚Äôt even know I could become an ascended master, let alone that someone was trying to stop me! What am I in, some kinda epic movie?! 

Well, maybe we all are in some way‚Ä¶ ü§î

At any rate, from this experience and what I‚Äôve been through, my journey has been one of the transformation and healing, and wanting to express the highest expression of my heart. 

I don‚Äôt know if I have done that well over the years, but I want to more each day be in service to you‚Ä¶ even when I don‚Äôt know how.

I‚Äôm not really sure what else to put here, so thanks for watching! üôè‚ú®üíõ

snippet.title: The New Ten Commandments
snippet.description:
Hmm, in reflection upon posting I think I can make this video way better. I‚Äôll do a new version sometime soon, but for now please enjoy this first draft!

~~~

1. Truth is the Law, Love is the Law, Authenticity is the Law. May you hold these in your heart above all else, and live your life by them firmly. 

2. Honor your word and the Word of God. Your words are your creative power. You were made in the image of the Creator and the Word of God is the vibration of creation. Recognize the power of sacred scriptures and study them when you find them. Become learned in the wisdom teachings given to humanity that they may ascend; the holy scriptures of every sacred religion and the sciences of the day. Learn to identify and discern within your heart the difference between that which is True and that which is delusive, and always speak with Truth, Love, and Authenticity.  

3. Observe the unity in all things. There is no separation.

4. Take care of yourself, others, and nature.

5. Always clean up after yourself. 

6. Be kind and generous.

7. Be forgiving.

8. Listen first to understand and then speak to be understood. Do not speak when your words are empty and meaningless, lest you only waste everyone's time.
 
9. Explore your multidimensionality. Consciousness extends far beyond and deep within the body. It is through mind and spirit you may discover all that the cosmos has in store for you.

10. Have faith and trust that all can be redeemed and transformed. It is by inward devotion to the Divine and the willingness to listen and act upon the guidance received that this may come about. Personal sacrifice will be necessary along the path, which is a sacrifice of your time, effort, and energy as an offering of love and service towards the Supreme Ultimate Reality, that life may be better for all.

‚Äî‚Äî

Cover Image by WiPaLo the Artist!

When we take the time to step deeper into the Hindu traditions, we learn of the 'three gunas', these states which all things in reality are said to take form by. When we understand the gunas, we learn how to overcome ignorance in the field, and become masters of our inner and outer reality.

Patchman

snippet.title: What the Heck is a Hunab-Ku?!
snippet.description:
The Ancient Mayans had a mysterious and fascinating culture about them. Their art, spirituality, and designs are especially interesting, and we find many parallells in teachings to other mystic traditions the world over.

This cosmic civilization has so much to teach us, and one of their many lessons is that of the Hunab Ku, a curious glyph which appears to be very similar to a yin-yang. In this video, let us explore it's symbolism, and see what wisdom we might glean from it.

snippet.title: The Science of Psychedelics (ft. Dr. Rick Strassman)
snippet.description:
Go deep into the nature of Psychedelics, watch the replay of our "What is Plant Medicine" masterclass. Click Here to watch now - https://www.spiritmysteries.com/walkwithmedicine

Psychedelics have fascinated humans since ancient history, and yet today thanks to the stigma created around them, we don't really know that much about them... Where do psychedelics take you when you take them?

snippet.title: The Nature of the Soul... More Mystical Traditions
snippet.description:
In this Soul-series follow-up, we explore some less commonly discussed ideas on the nature of the soul, including indigenous and shamanic understandings. 

Perhaps the most significant correlation, which may help us all understand better, is that in nearly all cultures, the word Spirit means 'breath'. The breath of life, even biblically speaking, was that thing which became the animating principle in the first humans. By knowing our breath, we may know our life. 

~ ~ ~

snippet.title: How Symbols Rule Our Minds
snippet.description:
There is a language hidden in plain sight, one which has been used since Homo Sapiens first left Africa... but few can read it properly. This is the language of symbols.

Every day we probably see hundreds of symbols, from letters to logos. Symbols can represent very large or very simple concepts, but what is not often known, is that at the heart of every symbol is an idea which plays out in our conscious and subconscious mind.


Looking for a place to connect with others on the path of truth, love, and authentic inner light? We just launched a School for Self Mastery! Check it out here: https://www.spiritmysteries.school

snippet.title: How to Deal with the Tree of Death
snippet.description:
Last week we published a new Spirit Science episode about the Tree of Death... But I wanted to take some more time to explore the subject and flesh out the concept. 

We have to recognize that the Tree of Death, just like the Tree of Life, should we choose to acknowledge it - would exist within us just as much as it's around us. If what the mystics all say is true, then as above, so below, as within, so without. 

Thus, if we can deal with and transform that which is within us, our relationship to the outside world can also transform.

Thus, the only demons are the ones in our own hearts - and that is where every battle must be fought. - Gandhi

Of course, all spiritual paths lead up the mountain of light, but one of the best ways i've found to do it (and fastest by far) is with sacred plant medicine in ceremony. And perhaps even more specifically, ceremony at Rythmia - because they do it RIGHT.

"Show me who I have become" - "merge me with my soul at all costs" - "heal my heart" - these are the stages of transformation, and it's the space Rythmia holds for all of their guests.

Truly, it's an honour to share them with you here, and if you are interested to learn more, use this link: https://rythmia.link/spirit

snippet.title: How "Little Women" Heals the Gender Divide on a Metaphysical Level
snippet.description:
Transform your consciousness from the inside out by harmonizing all four elements within! Discover the Four Elements Transformation, our brand new course for inner alchemy and harmony: https://www.spiritmysteries.com/four-elements

Are you a fan of the classic novel "Little Women"? Did you know that there's a hidden spirituality behind the story that most people aren't aware of? In this video, we take a deep dive into the mystical elements of Louisa May Alcott's legendary masterpiece. From the original text to all its modern adaptations, we explore the four elements and how they relate to the characters and themes of the story. You'll be surprised to learn just how mystical and spiritual this beloved tale truly is. So grab a cup of tea and join us as we uncover "The Hidden Spirituality of Little Women."

snippet.description:

Are you willing and able to receive? Find out by watching this through, and see what it means for you...

snippet.title: The Hidden Easter Eggs in "Nightmare Before Christmas" You Missed
snippet.description:
In this episode of Hidden Spirituality, we explore the beloved classic that is "Nightmare Before Christmas", and uncover the hidden meanings and spiritual themes woven throughout the film. From the concept of duality and balance to the exploration of life, death, and the afterlife, we delve into the deeper layers of this whimsical tale. Whether you're a die-hard fan of the movie or just discovering it for the first time, this video is sure to offer a fresh perspective and inspire new insights. snippet.title: Could Disney's "Atlantis" Actually Be Real?
snippet.description:
Disney's "Atlantis" is a fascinating and often-overlooked movie that raises some interesting questions about history and mythology. Could the story of a lost civilization beneath the sea be based in reality? Join us as we explore the possible connections between the movie and real-life historical events and legends. From the ancient Greeks to modern-day theories about underwater cities, we'll dive deep into the mysteries of Atlantis and examine the evidence that supports the idea that this mythical place may have actually existed. So join us on this journey of discovery, and let's see if we can unravel the secrets of one of the most enduring legends of all time.

If you'd like to explore this concept (and many more) with a heart-centered community, come join Spiritverse: https://spiritverse.app/ and meet thousands of curious souls from around the world.

snippet.description:
If you exist in the world today, you've probably ran into some toxic positivity... Maybe you've heard the classics, "oh everything happens for a reason", "love is all there is", "don't get angry, its not spiritual"... maybe you've even embodied it once or twice, or maybe at least you've had it dished out to you. snippet.title: Secrets of Hollow Earth
snippet.description:
While it's often fictionalised in the media and movies, there are some curious theories about hollow earth, including some potential evidence for such a theory. Many ancients Buddhist texts reference the mythical Kingdom of Agartha, and countless cultures around the world have described ancient beings or gods as coming up from under the Earth and bringing knowledge and wisdom with them...

Ironically for being just a theory, this video was actually struck by YouTube for "Hate Speech"... so make of that what you will...

snippet.title: Is it Wrong to be Materialistic?
snippet.description:
We've all heard that old tale of how -in order to become enlightened, you have to detach yourself from the world and go full on hermit mode in a cave in the mountains... but what does enlightenment look like in the modern world?

If spiritual understanding comes from within... it has no bearing on your environment... so what's stopping you from becoming enlightened in the frozen yogurt isle at Target? Sure, it's easy to run away to the mountains and meditate because there's nothing to distract you there... but is that true discipline?

Countless spiritual systems seem to denounce materialism... but we must have our Ego and bodies for a reason... nothing happens by accident, so is it truly wrong to live a material life?

For a complete list of sources, visit: https://www.spiritsciencecentral.com/blog/is-it-wrong-to-be-materialistic-spirit-science-47

snippet.title: What's Faster than Light?
snippet.description:
Decades ago, breaking the sound barrier was a huge deal in transportation science... but many didn't think it could be done. What if the Light Barrier is the next big breakthrough in engineering?

Following the work of Steven Greer, there's a simple truth we have to acknowledge... in our universe, light is too damn slow. To get from one side of the Milky Way to the other it would take about 100,000 years even travelling at light speed... but countless reports of UFOs, ET's and unexplained phenomena implies these advanced civilisations have technology capable of going even faster...

Maybe even moving through different dimensions of reality or warping space itself... today we take a dive into SciFi and ask the question of what could be faster than light.


For a complete list of sources, visit: https://www.spiritsciencecentral.com/blog/what-s-faster-than-light-spirit-science-46

snippet.title: The Anunnaki Movie ~ The Mysterious Origins of Humanity
snippet.description:
Part 2 of the Sumerian Epic Saga shifts the focus from Nibiru, to the legendary "Anunnaki", which translates as "Sky Gods", and whom are said to play a significant role in the creation of our species. 

The Ancient Sumerian mythology stands both on its own as a wellspring of curiosities, but is also observed as an origin point for many biblical stories which we are all familiar today, where we even see a possible origin point for the story of Adam and Eve in the Garden of Eden. 

Could the "God" written of in Genesis actually be describing Anunnaki from an even older Sumerian Myth? 

Along with this, the Anunnaki Movie also shares exclusive interviews from Gaia's Ancient Civilizations, featuring both Gregg Braden and Graham Hancock. These incredible thought-leaders share groundbreaking discoveries which further add weight to the mysteries of the Anunnaki. 

For those called to go further, once complete with the Sumerian Epic, you are invited to watch Ancient Civilizations for free, by clicking here: https://bit.ly/STREAM_NOW

snippet.title: The Spiritual Money Movie ~ Master your Financial Reality
snippet.description:
Money and spirituality are a conversation often as polarizing as spirituality and science. This is likely because in many spiritual teachings, money is related in some way with being evil. For example, a common phrase of the day comes from Bible, which says "the love of money is the root of all evil."

We took it upon ourselves to learn about money and take the conversation seriously, attempting to find the understanding which walks the middle line - how do we understand money from a spiritual perspective without putting it before God? How do we live with money in the world when it is so polarizing when spirituality is involved?

Through this documentary, let us walk down this path together.

It's some wonder then why mainstream healthcare has taken so long to catch onto the science of Earthing... but now they are, and are finding some incredible things! snippet.title: How Mystery Schools Changed the World...
snippet.description:
Thousands of years ago, Mystery Schools provided a form of spiritual community and teachings that existed across the emerging civilised world, from Egypt to Greece, and even spanning into India and Europe... 

The Mysteries brought so much to the world, from laying the foundation for modern math, chemistry, physics, and philosophy, and even facilitating the creation of the Olympic Games! While nearly 2000 years ago, the flame of the Mysteries was nearly extinguished, they have experienced many rebirths in the last thousand years... 

The mystic teachings spurred the Renaissance in Italy and facilitated a new wave of awareness towards even the most traditional and orthodox religions... Today, the Mysteries are once again experiencing a rebirth, and for those who are seeking a space for true, deep spiritual transformation, a new platform shines light through the veil of the night, bringing us all together to ground this transformation into the world.

snippet.title: From Teen to Master: The Evolution of Spiritual Growth in "Avatar: The Last Airbender"
snippet.description:
"Avatar: The Last Airbender" captured our hearts with its charming characters, thrilling action, and deeper spiritual themes. But have you ever wondered why it's always a young teenager who has to save the world with little-to-no help from their parents? In the second part of our "Hidden Spirituality" series on "Avatar: The Last Airbender," we explore the nature of spiritual mastery, maturity, and evolution.

Join us as we dive deeper into the spiritual themes of "Avatar: The Last Airbender" and explore the journey of Aang and his friends as they seek to master the elements and save the world from destruction. We'll examine the role of age and experience in spiritual growth, and explore the importance of maturity and evolution in the journey towards enlightenment. Don't miss this fascinating exploration of one of the most beloved animated series of all time.

Sometimes, the biggest struggles we have come from not having the right support system to help us navigate the ups and downs of life. Come and join our sacred community and connect with likeminded souls from around the world: https://spiritverse.app/

snippet.title: Near-Death Experiences
snippet.description:
Imagine you're on the operating table... you close your eyes and all of a sudden hear what sounds like a singing bowl and feel a great wave of vibration. The next thing you know you're up and about, looking back at your body and floating through different dimensions, meeting beings familiar and strange. 

Welcome to the world of NDE's.

Near-Death Experiences are very unique; permeating across cultures, religions, and social barriers across human history for generations. In such cases, they most often compel life-changing realizations in those who experience them. 


Barbara's experience: https://www.near-death.com/science/experts/barbara-whitfield.html

snippet.title: The Legend of Mu ~ The Sumerian Epic (Part 6)
snippet.description:
The story of the Sumerian Epic continues with the Legend of Mu, revealing the mysteries of the lost civilizations of the world. After humanity was created, it was said that we moved to a continent called Mu, also known today as Lemuria, and the beginning of our civilization truly began. 

What historical evidence do we see for Lemuria, and could it be that these, along with Atlantis, truly existed? 

Check out the brand new Aquarian Age edition of the Emerald Tablets, and see how deep the rabbit hole really goes. https://www.spiritmysteries.com/emerald-tablets

snippet.title: The Spiritual Roots of Science
snippet.description:
At the heart of Western society lies a foundation in the scientific method... the belief that an objective and testable reality exists. But it's no secret that some of the greatest minds in scientific history also acknowledged a debt of gratitude to spiritual philosophies...

From Einstein claiming Spinoza's Pantheism was in line with his idea of God, to Newton translating the Emerald Tablet of Hermes... spirituality and science have more in common than any two fields in history, we just need to think with a little perspective!

Sources:

The Principia: Mathematical Principles of Natural Philosophy. Translated by Cohen, I. Bernard; Whitman, Anne; Budenz, Julia: Isaac Newton: 1726

https://www.academia.edu/7072076/The_Influence_of_Renaissance_Hermeticism_on_the_Scientific_Revolution

The Hermetica: Wisdom of the Pharaohs. Timothy Freke & Peter Gandy 

https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2018/04/harvard-researchers-study-how-mindfulness-may-change-the-brain-in-depressed-patients/

https://www.nytimes.com/1997/07/22/science/far-apart-2-particles-respond-faster-than-light.html

https://youtu.be/wFT7hrktm-A

Dunderberg, Ismo (2008), Beyond gnosticism: myth, lifestyle, and society in the school of Valentinus

Magris, Aldo (2005), "Gnosticism: Gnosticism from its origins to the Middle Ages (further considerations)", in Jones, Lindsay (ed.), MacMillan Encyclopedia of Religion, MacMillan

Leiber, Fritz (1981). "Poor Superman". In Heinlein, Robert A. (ed.). Tomorrow, the Stars (16th ed.). 

Mann, Adam (14 May 2014): "The Strange, Secret History of Isaac Newton's Papers"

https://webapp1.dlib.indiana.edu/newton/ (All of Newton‚Äôs Alchemical writing are now online for free for you to read!)

Giuseppe Gembillo (2007) Analogy Between the Theorem of Pythagoras and the Relations of Uncertainty of Heisenberg, World Futures, 63:1, 38-41

https://www.philosophicalsociety.com/einstein%27s_spiritual_insight.html (Einstein Quote)

https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s41470-019-00038-z

Hume, R. E. (1921). In H. Milford (Ed.), The thirteen principal Upanishads: translated from Sanskrit with an outline of the philosophy of the Upanishads and an annotated bibliography. Oxford University Press.

http://www.physicstoday.org/resource/1/phtoad/v19/i9/p119_s2?bypassSSO=1

 Lema√Ætre, Georges (9 May 1931). "The Beginning of the World from the Point of View of Quantum Theory". Nature. 127 (3210): 706.

https://www.amnh.org/learn-teach/curriculum-collections/cosmic-horizons-book/georges-lemaitre-big-bang

snippet.title: The Surprising Spiritual Lessons of "The Perks of Being a Wallflower"
snippet.description:
Looking for a place to connect with others on the path of truth, love, and authentic inner light? Come join the community and let's evolve our consciousness together: https://www.spiritverse.app/

Join us as we explore the timeless message of 'The Perks of Being a Wallflower', a story about the journey to self-discovery and the power of connection. 

Through the eyes of Charlie, a high school student struggling to find his place in the world, we learn about the infinite layers of the human psyche and the importance of embracing our uniqueness. Despite being set in the early '90s, this coming-of-age tale is relevant to people of all ages and backgrounds, reminding us that we are more alike than we are different. Through the characters' experiences, we gain insights into our own lives and the people around us, discovering the joys of higher awareness and seeing the true selves of others. So grab your headphones, put on your favorite mix-tape, and join us on a journey of self-discovery with "The Perks of Being a Wallflower".

snippet.title: Healing With Food: The Movie!
snippet.description:
The times we are living in are of no comparison to anything most of us can compare in our memory or recent history. It is more important than ever that we take the time to prepare our bodies and minds to rise in awareness. We are only just beginning to understand the living nature of reality, and rising into a higher dimension of being. 

Knowing the nature of food, we can use it to become healthy and powerful, or weak and stiff... It is up to us to choose. In this documentary, we explore all of the ways that food can heal or harm us; may it support all who wish to evolve their relationship with food. 

This film is not intended to replace medical advice. 

IMPORTANT NOTE* It seems as though 2 small errors in this video.

1) The human body does produce B12 under certain circumstances but cannot be relied upon, especially in general western cultures with the types of foods that we eat. 

2) Spirulina does not contain B12 in the same way that we thought - it contains an imitation B12, similar but not quite the same.

Thank you to our amazing audience for helping to point this out. We are reviewing these items to see if we should edit and re-upload the video.

~ ~ ~

Jordans 7-Day Dry Fast - http://theriverofjordan.com/index.php/2017/10/21/7-days-dry-my-first-lengthy-dry-fast/

This film features clips from:
Forks over Knives
Vegucated
Food Inc

snippet.description:

There's a lot of things we've been taught about money, and a lot of those things aren't true! Today, we smash the money myths once and for all, and reveal a hidden truth about the nature of money! In doing so, we may even learn something new about ourselves...

UPDATE: I'd like to clarify that yes - in the bible, it says "The love of money" not just "Money is the root of all evil", which I did not specify in this video. snippet.description:
Have you ever heard of someone healing their cancer in just one night? How about depression and anxiety cured outright in just 6 hours? If not, watch on, and journey beyond time and space into the mystical world of Ayahuasca...

This film is a labour of love, inspired by my own personal experiences with Ayahuasca, and my desire to share that experience with you. I firmly believe that if we are able to embrace the mystical power of these experiences and use them for genuine - heartfelt healing and transformation, we can gracefully evolve into a new kind of human, and in that... a new way of life altogether. 

Remember, just taking a shamanic plant medicine does not automatically guarantee you healing. You have to genuinely want it, your intention must be right. If you use these experiences without a pure intent, or without any intention at all... well, there‚Äôs really no telling what could happen.

snippet.title: The Creation of Humanity ~ The Sumerian Epic (Part 5)
snippet.description:
Ancient mythology tells us of humanity‚Äôs first steps upon an abundant landscape. A careful study of our ancient texts, however, reveals a different perspective of this pristine paradise. Click here to stream Ancient Civilizations now! http://bit.ly/StreamAncientCivilizations 

The Sumerian Epic continues with the specific details on the creation of mankind. The tablets tell us that it was the Sumerian God named Enki, along with his wife Ninhursag (also Damkina/Ninmah) who created humanity. They did this by mixing ‚Äúdivine blood‚Äù with the ‚Äúclay of the earth‚Äù. This shows the paradoxical duality of mankinds nature, being both earth-born and heaven-born at the same time, a fusion of the two.

Yet, fanciful metaphors aside... How exactly did this happen, and did it happen for real? Is there any evidence to support that this event actually took place in our ancient past? 

Throughout this exciting chapter, discover the ancient African ruins that are thought today by some to be the remnants of gold mines, along with anomalies our own genetic history that supports this incredible theory!

snippet.title: The Nibiru Movie ~ The Secret Origins of our World
snippet.description:
The film opens the discussions and questions regarding the mysterious yet popular ‚Äúconspiracy theory‚Äù of Nibiru, the supposed hidden planet that lurks in the farthest reaches of our outer solar system. 

It was nearly 50 years ago that the Nibiru Mystery first reached the world through time and space. It was in Zechariah Sitchin‚Äôs first book ‚ÄúThe Twelfth Planet‚Äù, which put forth the idea that the oldest texts on the planet, the Cuneiform tablets of Sumer, encoded legends which describe the creation of our solar system, and ourselves. 

While the theories are often discredited, we decided to look at the story at a deeper level, and find out if there was really anything to it.

snippet.title: Spirit Science 1 Remake ~ Thoughts Are Things!
snippet.description:
In 2019, the original episode of Spirit Science was revisited and expanded, taking the conversation deeper than it ever was before. 

Thoughts are things, and this idea shouldn't be taken lightly. When we consider the subtle effect we have on others, we learn to be more mindful of what we think. 

Each day, we are constantly impressing ourselves upon the field through our thoughts and feelings, and thus create our realities. It's only in this way that our actions come about, and if our thoughts and feelings are pure, so too will our actions be also.

snippet.title: Spirit Science ~ Happy New Year 2019 (Again!)
snippet.description:
Wait for a second... didn't we do this already? ... Hm, it seems we did! So the last New Years' video had to get taken down, only a day after we published it. But instead of just re-uploading a slightly different version, we felt it would be best to take the opportunity to actually discuss many of the things we've been wanting to open up and share about. Enjoy!

Replace your Netflix account with Gaia!
https://gaia.com/spiritscience

~ ~ 

Spirit Science has changed so much over the years, and so much has happened behind the scenes that affected its evolution. When the first New Year video came down, I really felt like it was some karma telling me I needed to take the time to make the video that I've been wanting to make for a while, and the script for this one just poured out of me.

Despite this, there's still so much to discuss, but this feels like a really good "first step". The main focus here is the studio... It's been a long road with Spirit Science, and one of the biggest changes has been shifting from going at it willy-nilly, to stepping up to a more professional level, starting a studio, and being legit. This also means that Spirit Science has to take monetization seriously, in order for us to bring in a team of animators and make stuff at a higher and higher level.

When Spirit Science first started, I was living in my parent's basement, and for a long time I traveled around and stayed with people who invited me to live with them, but none of these options were really a solid "root" for me to live from, which is one of the reasons that Spirit Science has struggled. 

In 2016, I planted a seed of a Studio, and at the tail end of 2016, hired my friend Aaron to help me make the studio properly. We've come a long way, but we have a long way to go still yet. You can pause and read the Mission/Vision statement of the company in this video, if you're interested, and see what we're really all about.

Thanks for reading! Love you eternally

snippet.title: Cannabis: The Definitive Guide
snippet.description:
As you might be aware, Canada just legalized cannabis! As residents of this country, the Spirit Science crew felt there was no better time to make a video all about this mysterious and magical plant! 

We have found that it is very important for a global discussion around plant medicine to take place, both the positive and the negative sides of it all, including its challenges and their solutions. Today, there is still a bit of a stereotype around Cannabis use, but that is quickly changing, and the realization sets in of its healing nature!

Appearing in ancient and historical references throughout time, the benefits and practical uses of Cannabis seem to be limitless. From healing to athletic conditioning, see how this original medicine‚Äôs resilience has continued to influence our society. Click here to watch another special presentation about Cannabis and it's use: http://bit.ly/AllAboutCannabis

snippet.title: The Dirt on Agriculture
snippet.description:
Want to transform your financial paradigm? Learn the secrets of spiritual wealth transformation in this presentation üí¥ https://www.spiritmysteries.com/SMM 

Welcome back to Spirit Science! Today we get our hands dirty as we investigate the plant agricultural systems of our modern world, and discover what is happening beneath our feet around the world. 

Because of the way we have constructed our lives as a species when investigating industrial plant-based agriculture, we have found that the system is in the same kind of trouble as it is with the other industries that we‚Äôve looked at previously. 

The issues surrounding plant-based agriculture are slightly different, but don‚Äôt let that fool you. They are just as dangerous as any other of the heavily commercialized industrial practices are on our health. Although there seem to be fewer diseases related to consuming mass-produced plants they are still responsible for major health issues due to modern chemical agriculture, genetic modification, and low nutrient quality. 

When we found out that the most traditionally nourishing plant foods on the planet now have the lowest levels of nutrients within them than they ever have, we just had to find out why! One of the things we found out is that it all comes down to the dirt. 

For the full video description and sources, check out our website ~
https://www.spiritsciencecentral.com/blog/Spirit%20Science%2033_9%20The%20Dirt%20on%20Agriculture

snippet.title: Spirit Science 2 ~ Chakras
snippet.description:
Transform your life and unlock your full potential with the power of the Four Elements!  https://www.spiritmysteries.com/four-elements

Chakras are a reflection of the patterns present in the universe, permeating through all aspects of reality. These seven energy centers are found in the frequencies of music, colors, and senses, which include thoughts and emotions. The number seven is regarded as sacred, as it is mentioned in the Bible, where Joshua and Israel marched seven times around Jericho, accompanied by seven priests blowing seven trumpets, before the walls collapsed.

When we learn about chakras, we can experience the same movement within ourselves. The most common system is the seven basic chakras, each with its unique function such as survival, sex, willpower, and love. However, other systems, like the 13 chakra system, also exist. Each chakra is associated with a Sanskrit name and influences specific practical aspects of our life.

Chakras are non-physical, energetic openings on our body that impact our physical, emotional, and spiritual well-being. Through chakra healing, we can unleash our inner power, transform our lives, and activate our energy centers to achieve true bliss. Understanding the science behind chakras can help us unlock our full potential and experience the many benefits they offer.

For the full video description and sources, check out our website ~
https://www.spiritsciencecentral.com/blog/spirit-science-2-chakras

snippet.title: The Miracle of Fasting (Heal Your Body With Water!)
snippet.description:
There‚Äôs a lot of ways you can spend your time, but wouldn‚Äôt you agree that it should be spent with awesome people just like you, striving for a better tomorrow? If so, check out our sacred community for self mastery, it‚Äôs a game changer: https://www.spiritmysteries.school

In this episode, we continue our exploration into health and nutrition by discovering what could very well be one of the greatest healing abilities that we have available to us‚Äîfasting. Fasting has been described as a miracle cure by countless generations before us due to its inexplicable nature to rapidly detox the body and put us into a state of rapid rejuvenation. 

In addition to this, fasting also is a powerful spiritual practice that has been used as a technique across many spiritualities for thousands of years and said to connect us with God regardless of the faith. 

There are many different types of fasts, whether it be water fasting, juice fasting, intermittent fasting, or dry fasting. There are other fasts that combine these together which have been more recently invented, such as ‚Äòthe master fast cleanse‚Äô as well. In this video, we look at all of them and explore the value and benefits of them all.

snippet.title: The Untold History of Tarot
snippet.description:
The cards featured in this episode are Patch Tarot, our custom Tarot which unites the two primary Tarot decks used today, the Rider Waite and Thoth Tarot. Click here to learn more and order a copy: https://www.spiritmysteries.com/discover-patch-tarot

Tarot is very much a mystery even in the world today, for even its origins are somewhat elusive at best. While it may appear at first that the cards emerged as a game in the 13th century, their archetypes, numerology, and other symbolic connections draw many paralells with ancient Egyptian and Hebrew mysticism. 

With that said, regardless of it's origins; the history of Tarot a colorful and intricate story and language which we may come to see in our day to day lives, and over generations in society. In this, one finds that Tarot is a versatile system of ancient and esoteric knowledge. 

Today, the Rider-Waite-Smith and Thoth Tarot have become two foundational decks upon which most are based. This is even true in Patch Tarot, where the two systems have been harmoniously fused together. 

Tom Tadford Little website ~
http://web.archive.org/web/20080716033756/http://www.tarothermit.com/

Music by John Hand & TerraTonz

snippet.title: The Essence of Tarot
snippet.description:
Discover this brand new tarot deck which thousands have used to raise their self-awareness and grow closer to God. ‚ú®It's homemade and so much fun: https://www.spiritmysteries.com/discover-patch-tarot

Tarot is a subject which deals in fundamental archetypes, which may be observed and interpreted to be underlying both the human experience and the natural world. When one takes the time to consider and contemplate the Tarot system, they begin to comprehend what might be called 'the body of consciousness', and know themselves to a greater degree. 

The purpose of Tarot is multifold and can be used for very enlightening or mundane purposes. Familiarization with such patterns supports the conscious mind in being more aware of what the heart feels, and what guidance comes from Spirit. Thus, proper use of the Tarot is an avenue by which we may reflect upon all that transpires in ones life, and a supportive instrument in making choices based on deeper consideration first. 

The cards featured in this video are called Patch Tarot, which are a deck created by the author of Spirit Science, who has passionately explored the subject for many years.

snippet.title: Qabalah and the Tree of Life
snippet.description:
Enter the world of Qabbalah and the Tree of Life. Together, these are names for a map and model of understanding the spiritual, physical, and metaphysical aspects of life. This particular model, which combines a fusion of traditional Kabbalah with Hermeticism and other mystic teachings, is known by the spelling "Qabalah". The Tree of Life, on the other hand, is a cosmic glyph said to describe everything in creation. Together, they describe how the universe comes into being, the structure of our essential being, and how to live naturally with all of creation. 

Qabalah is a philosophy and science which uses the Tree of Life to explain the nature of creation. While this is a massive rabbit hole in-and-of itself, this episode begins to open up the conversation on the subject. Enjoy! üôèüíõ‚ú®

For the full video description and sources, check out our website ~
https://www.spiritsciencecentral.com/blog/Spirit%20Science%2035_1%20The%20Qabalah%20(Tree%20of%20Life%20Pt-%201)

snippet.title: The History of Psychedelics! üçÑ
snippet.description:
The first recorded use of psychedelics is nearly impossible to find, because it stretches back to before even the written word was first carved. 

One of the great pioneers of psychedelics for our world, Terence Mckenna, has suggested that humanity even evolved thanks to psychedelics, and without them we wouldn't be who we are today. 

Looking into ancient history, we see many ancient cave drawings depicting what appears to be humanoids with geometric waves shooting out of their heads, and even people with mushroom heads.

Seeing thus that throughout history, psychedelics are prevalent... what can they teach us today, as we learn to honour their value.  

This episode explores an overview of the history of psychedelics, and was made as a part of a team project with Collective Evolution. Watch their full documentary here - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E3Qr94E6NpI

snippet.description:
One of the most transformative ancient texts now updated for our New Age. Get the Aquarian Age Edition of the Emerald Tablets of Thoth üôå https://spiritmysteries.com/emerald-tablets

There was once a small village within a forest of trees. Word started to spread among the people that there was a wise holy man who lived in a small house at the top of the mountain. One man truly wanted to visit the holy man, to ask him questions and get advice on his own life problems. He set out on a long and difficult journey to visit the man. 

This parable teaches us the lesson of ‚Äúdon‚Äôt judge a book by its cover.‚Äù You never know who is who, who has suffered and who is full of joy. It‚Äôs not our place to cast judgments on people that we don‚Äôt know - or on anyone for that matter.

snippet.description:
Scientists, historians, and archeologists are actively engaged in answering the big questions about human origins, our relationship to each other and the world around us. http://bit.ly/PatchmanMissingLinks  But advances in technology and scientific techniques are uncovering paradigm-shattering discoveries that are forcing a crisis in their way of thinking. The models and historical narratives that were once accepted as truth are no longer holding up to the evidence being uncovered. http://bit.ly/PatchmanMissingLinks

You know the idea that a subtle flitter of a butterfly's wing can be the catalyst for the creation of a hurricane or a tornado on the other side of the planet? This applies to everything, and Mars retrograde is no exception. The smallest shift, the change in the gravitational relationship with mars, created much larger results with many smaller shifts and events that played out here on earth.

To learn more about Quantum Gravity and Mars Retrograde, Please Visit ~ 
http://thespiritscience.net/marscrescendograde

Check out Nassim Harameins Peer Reviewed Journal Here ~ 
http://resonance.is/explore/quantum-gravity-and-the-holographic-mass-trailer-and-press-release/

Mars and Saturn retrograde, as all retrogrades go, are times for reflection and observation of the way that we act and behave with each other, and cultivating the striving forward motion that feels so good when we are inflow. 

For Mars, it's more about the emotional side of our male energy. For Saturn, its more about the order and structure of the way we operate inside our world. 

Retrogrades help us find the true essence of what we want to act on, and so you may find that you simply have no energy to spend on things that you were wasting your energy on before.

snippet.title: The Spiritual Singularity...
snippet.description:

In our everyday lives, we often think of reality as filled with solid objects of material density... Yet, in the quantum reality, atoms and subatomic particles are filled with vast amounts of empty space. 

The brilliant physicist Nassim Haramein has described how the vacuum of space works, expressing forms through sacred geometry in a multitude of intricate and beautiful patterns. Haramein even suggests that the entire universe itself may exist inside a supermassive black hole.

snippet.title: Spirit Science 10 ~ The Math of God
snippet.description:
Over 2000 years ago, the Pythagoreans believed the universe to be made up of numbers and proportions, prizing geometry as a sacred art akin to understanding God itself...

The golden ratio is a perfect, infinite ratio that can be found everywhere in nature, from flowers, animals, and even within our very bodies. This perfect ratio was even imbued in ancient buildings because it's significance was understood. The more it is studied, the more we find that it may truly be found everywhere. 

The more we understand where reality comes from, the deeper we probe into our metaphysical selves, and come to know who and what we truly are.

For the full video description and sources, check out our website ~

Then we have our own man-made cycles, like time, daily routines, the economy, the creation and destruction of new and old inventions.

snippet.title: Clarity on Spirit Science
snippet.description:
There have been a lot of questions recently about Spirit Science and it's evolution. What are we up to, where are we going? Some people had made up some ideas as well about Spirit Science becoming Cult-Like and a new Religion, which Jordan and I thought was ridiculous. So we decided to put together this video to shine some clarity on the matter. 

We both apologize for creating any confusion that we may have, and we thank you loving beings for staying loving and kind no matter what video is posted. As for everyone who has been so mean and nasty recently, perhaps this video can help clear up some things about how you have been feeling... and perhaps this can also be a reminder not to be so mean. It doesn't serve anyone, especially yourself. 

Were new to this whole "travel the world, make fun videos, shift the planet" stuff as well, so we ask that you be patient with us. It gets hard to manage 50 emails a day asking for spiritual guidance constantly.

Keep asking questions, make decisions for yourself, and move forward into the light! 
Create what you want to create, and trust yourself above all else! (Your true self!) 

I love you! Have a Happy New Year!!
~Patchman

snippet.title: Torus Energy 101: How Toroidal Fields Work
snippet.description:
A torus is a self-organizing geometric pattern which is found virtually everywhere in nature, including within ourselves and even in the cosmos. 

A wonderful example of this can be found within our bodies; our hearts of which have their own toroidal fields through and around them. This field emanate around our bodies and interact energetically with our external reality. We can also see this exact same pattern around the Earth itself, which shares the same geometric electromagnetic blueprint. 

Through this episode, join Patchman and his friend Kris as they explore the toroidal flow of creation.

snippet.title: Water and the Spirit of Life
snippet.description:
Water is one of the most important ingredients for life, found in abundance in all living things. In this we find an understanding of water, that goes beyond just a fundamental necessity, but a spiritual knowing of waters true nature. There is a reason that water is so often spoken of in the Tao Te Ching, where Lao Tzu relates Spirit itself to being like water. 

In this episode of Spirit Science, we also focus on the work of Dr. Masaru Emoto, who first pioneered the idea of discovering hidden messages in water by exposing it to different emotions, vibrations, and frequencies. His work has been foundational in the field of consciousness, and demonstrates a powerful link between human thought and how reality manifests. 

For the full video description and sources, check out our website ~
https://www.spiritsciencecentral.com/blog/Spirit%20Science%2020%20Water

snippet.title: An Experiment in Expression
snippet.description:
Money and Spirituality DO go together! Come and discover how you can transform your spiritual financial paradigm today üîÆ https://www.spiritmysteries.com/SMM 

Check out Elijah Ray's amazing music on Spotify! ~ https://open.spotify.com/artist/06vQrpQw4sEnbGHnVbCghf

This week, I would like to take some time to talk about Words. Words are very fascinating, because some Words have an intrinsic meaning that goes along with the vibration, and other words have no meaning, but we give them meaning based on how we use them. 

I have learned to strive to understand what all vibrations are and ask questions as to why these words are expressed in the way that they are. Words like Spirit, Holographic Universe, and God are all words that are incredibly misunderstood in our day and age, and to look at the Root of the word will yield a deeper understanding of why we use the word as we do.

The Expression of the Universe manifests as you, and the All of Infinity. You and I are an expression of the Source Consciousness Field, and we can express ourselves in any way that we choose. At least, that is what I have come to in my growth, and it is a truth that I would like to share with you. Whether you receive it or not, that's up to you. 

As usual, take what resonates and leave the rest behind, you get to decide.

Check these movies out: 
Thrive
HOME
The Life of Buddha
Gurren Lagann

snippet.title: A Message of Unity
snippet.description:
Money and Spirituality DO go together! Come and discover how you can transform your spiritual financial paradigm today üîÆ https://www.spiritmysteries.com/SMM 

As we continue Spirit Science and the Exploration into the ALL and the ONE, we must come to the realization that LOVE is the balance in which all exists in harmony and peace. We can strive to be in this space by accessing the source known as Christ Consciousness in the Sacred Space of your Heart, and when in tune with this place, we can know only Unconditional Love with everyone and everything.
 
It matters not who you are, what walk of life you emerge from, where you are going, or what you want in life. We must learn to come together regardless of our differences, regardless of the things that we see as separation, and see ourselves as what we really are. A collective species, on ONE planet, in ONE Solar System, Galaxy, and Universe. There is no Separation except that which exists in our minds.

And the best part about Unconditional Love ~ It's ALL Encompassing.

snippet.title: The Language of the Four Elements
snippet.description:
The four elements are found in all systems of creation and throughout the field of reality. This is because of the unfolding of number from one, or unity, into the multiplicity of creation. Such an unfolding is described in the Tao Te Ching, which essentially purports that the One begat Two, the Two begat Three, which begat Four, and from these came the myriad of all things.

The four elements are understood commonly as Earth, Fire, Water, and Air, and such a system can be seen throughout the natural world. We have the four elements, the four states of matter, the four seasons, the four directions, the four forces of nature, and so on... 

By ones study of the four elements, one comes to know and identify the various meanings of interpretation, depending from which lens we are observing them. Throughout this episode, let us explore the ways in which sacred geometry manifests, and see them united and whole within ourselves as well.

For the full video description and sources, check out our website ~
https://www.spiritsciencecentral.com/blog/Spirit%20Science%2018%20The%20Four%20Elements

snippet.title: Spirit Science 3 ~ Channeling
snippet.description:
Experience inner peace and balance with our Four Elements transformation course. https://www.spiritmysteries.com/four-elements

In this episode of Spirit Science, we delve into the concept of channeling, a widely popular phenomenon that involves perceiving information beyond our physical selves. The word "channel" originates from a term that means "that by which something passes or is transmitted," and thus, channeling refers to a process of inviting the Divine Intelligence to become more alive and present within us.

Contrary to popular belief, channeling does not necessarily involve a person sitting down and having spirits talk through them. Instead, it can manifest in various forms, such as the sensation of electricity rushing through us during moments of creative inspiration. Channeling can serve as a useful resource for understanding who we are and our place in the cosmos when we understand it correctly.

Some may believe that channeling is a way of opening oneself up to demons, which is a possibility. Still, the benefits of channeling, such as connecting with higher dimensions, tapping into the power of the universe, and discovering our true purpose in life, cannot be overlooked. Join us as we explore the truth about channeling and dispel any myths surrounding this fascinating phenomenon.

For the full video description and sources, check out our website ~
https://www.spiritsciencecentral.com/blog/Spirit%20Science%203%20Channeling

snippet.title: The Spirit Science Crystal Movie
snippet.description:
To understand the nature of crystals, it‚Äôs important to realize that everything is fundamentally a part of one great field of energy, vibrating together in a great unified quantum field. 

To understand this better, Fritjof Capra explains this in the Tao of Physics:

‚ÄúQuantum Theory reveals a basic oneness of the universe. It shows that we cannot decompose the world into independently existing smallest units. As we penetrate into matter, nature does not show us any isolated ‚Äòbasic building blocks‚Äô, but rather appears as a complicated web of relations between the various parts of the whole. These relations always include the observer in an essential way. [...] In atomic physics, we can never speak about nature without, at the same time, speaking about ourselves.‚Äù

Knowing this, we may learn to see everything as a part of ourselves, and thus crystals too are seen as expressions of creation which mirrors the same sacred geometric patterns by which we too are created. Thus, they seem to be conductors and transmitters of energy. Each crystal has its own geometric lattice, and thus, it's own particular radiant energy. 

In our exploration with crystals, we would do well to not grow attached to them or believe they are 'the ultimate solution' to our problems. However, just as adding spices to food which adds flavours, adding crystals to our spaces and adorning them on our bodies may add a subtle frequency to our field which may elevate our mind, body, and soul's connection with God.

For the full video description and sources, check out our website ~ https://www.spiritsciencecentral.com/crystal-movie

This special telling of our history explores a story which puts all of the pieces together from the mysteries explored in this first season of Spirit Science. He started to describe his different problems. After he asked for help on one of his issues, the Buddha said that he could not help with that problem. 

This parable asks us to look at the issues we have in our lives as a whole. The Buddha shows us that it‚Äôs not always the most important to focus on every single little issue in our lives.

It‚Äôs more crucial that we see our problems as a whole, and understand the root where they stem from.

snippet.title: The Parable of the Sandcastles ~ Patch Parables 1
snippet.description:
This first ever parable begins by sharing a message the transient nature of reality. 

Through life, we grow up often caring deeply about our possessions, even becoming very careful to build up that which is ours, and not let go. Yet, once our time here is complete, we pass away and leave it all behind. 

In the end, it would seem that the material objects don‚Äôt matter so much any longer, and what really counted was the experiences and connections we made; the relationships we have with ourselves, each other, and God. Let us all remember to practice living authentically, beyond just what we physically see and earn.

snippet.title: Spirit Science 8 ~ Meditation
snippet.description:
One of the most transformative ancient texts now updated for our New Age. Buy the  Aquarian Age Edition of the Emerald Tablets of Thoth, click here to get it now üôå https://www.spiritmysteries.com/emerald-tablets

Meditation may be one of the first spiritual technique's we ever learn, and one of the most valuable as well. Through meditation we may come to be centered, balanced, and experience a sense of wholeness by the calming of the thoughts in the mind. 

The word "meditation" comes from a word meaning "contemplation; devout preoccupation; private devotions, prayer," descending from the Proto-Indo-European root  *med-, meaning "take appropriate measures.". Through this understanding we may see that Meditation is the process of using timely foresight to appropriately handle our issues before they begin, by going within and finding our center.

This episode explores the importance of incorporating meditation into ones life, and how it affects us on every dimension of our being.

For the full video description and sources, check out our website ~

snippet.title: Spirit Science 4 ~ Masculine and Feminine Energy
snippet.description:
In this episode of Spirit Science, we explore the concept of Masculine and Feminine Energy and how they manifest in various aspects of our lives, such as physically, emotionally, mentally, and spiritually. Despite being polarizing energies, both Masculine and Feminine Energy exist in all of us and are essential to creating the multiplicity of creation.

However, the manifestation of these energies is not restricted to the physical bodies of males and females. Instead, Masculine and Feminine Energy refer to the polarizing energy that moves through us, and it is the degree to which they manifest together that determines the outcome.

Join us as we delve into the secrets of Masculine and Feminine Energy, discovering how to harness their power within, find balance, and unlock our true potential. With this knowledge, we can heal our inner Masculine and Feminine, transform our lives, and embrace our divine nature.
